[[Elena Valova]] |choreographer= |formerchoreographer= |skating club = [[University of Delaware FSC]] |retired = |combined total = |combined date = |SP score = |SP date = |FS score = |FS date = |dance score = |dance date = |CD score = |CD date = |OD score = |OD date = |FD score = |FD date = }} '''Taylor Toth''' (born July 22, 1988 in [[Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania]]) is an [[United States|American]] [[figure skater]] who has competed in [[pair skating]] and [[single skating]]. He competed in pairs with [[Felicia Zhang]] from 2009 to 2011. Together, they are the [[2010 United States Figure Skating Championships|2010 U.S. Junior champions]]. ==Career== Toth competed with [[Kylie Gleason]] winning at the juvenile and intermediate levels. He competed with Molly Aaron from 2004 through 2005. They competed on the [[2005-2006 ISU Junior Grand Prix]] at two events. They are the 2005 [[2005 United States Figure Skating Championships|U.S. novice pewter medalists]]. Their partnership ended before the [[2006 United States Figure Skating Championships|2006 U.S. Championships]]. Toth teamed up with [[Felicia Zhang]] in 2009 to compete on the junior level. They competed at the ISU Junior Grand Prix Poland (Turon Cup). They moved up to the senior level for the 2010-2011 season and competed in the Grand Prix at [[2010 Skate America|Skate America]], where they finished 7th, and [[2010 TrophÃ©e Eric Bompard|TrophÃ©e Eric Bompard]], where they finished 5th. On March 10, 2011, Zhang and Toth announced their partnership had ended.{{cite news | url = http://www.usfsa.org/Story.asp?id=45852&type=media | title = Pairs Team Felicia Zhang and Taylor Toth End Partnership | last = | first = | date = March 10, 2011 | work = [[U.S. Figure Skating]] | accessdate = June 7, 2011}} As a single skater, Toth won the junior level title at the 2007 U.S. Collegiate Championships. He graduated from the [[University of Delaware]] in 2011. == Competitive highlights == |- | [[Eastern Sectional Figure Skating Championships|Eastern Sectional Championships]] || || align="center" bgcolor="gold" | 1st (with Felicia Zhang) {| class="wikitable" |- !
